sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BASS2400 ( DPOB_CD , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD , BUSN_DTIL_OCCU_CLS_UCST_YR , PAY_ITEM_CD , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , PAY_CD , ITEM_NM , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , PYMT_DDUC_FRM_CD , PYMT_DDUC_RATE , PYMT_DDUC_SUM , TXTN_DIV_CD , FREE_DTY_RATE , FREE_DTY_SUM , JAN , FEB , MAR , APR , MAY , JUN , JUL , AUG , SEP , OCT , NOV , DEC , RNGE_ORD , PAY_ITEM_USE_YN , ITEM_APPTN_BGNN_DT , ITEM_APPTN_END_DT , DAY_MNTH_AMNT_DIV_CD , CALC_STD_DIV_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , USALY_AMNT_YN , ALLW_BNUS_AMNT_YN , PAY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT , ACC_PRCS_DIV_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #busnDtlTypOccuCd# , #busnDtilOccuClsUcstYr# , #payItemCd# , #payrMangDeptCd# , #payCd# , #itemNm# , #pymtDducDivCd# , #pymtDducFrmCd# , #pymtDducRate# , #pymtDducSum# , #txtnDivCd# , #freeDtyRate# , #freeDtySum# , #jan# , #feb# , #mar# , #apr# , #may# , #jun# , #jul# , #aug# , #sep# , #oct# , #nov# , #dec# , #rngeOrd# , #payItemUseYn# , #itemApptnBgnnDt# , #itemApptnEndDt# , #dayMnthAmntDivCd# , #calcStdDivCd# , #emymtDivCd# , #usalyAmntYn# , #allwBnusAmntYn# , #payItemNoteCtnt# , #accPrcsDivCd# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BASS2400 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD=#busnDtlTypOccuCd# , BUSN_DTIL_OCCU_CLS_UCST_YR=#busnDtilOccuClsUcstYr# , PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd# , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd# , PAY_CD=#payCd# , ITEM_NM=#itemNm# , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD=#pymtDducDivCd# , PYMT_DDUC_FRM_CD=#pymtDducFrmCd# , PYMT_DDUC_RATE=#pymtDducRate# , PYMT_DDUC_SUM=#pymtDducSum# , TXTN_DIV_CD=#txtnDivCd# , FREE_DTY_RATE=#freeDtyRate# , FREE_DTY_SUM=#freeDtySum# , JAN=#jan# , FEB=#feb# , MAR=#mar# , APR=#apr# , MAY=#may# , JUN=#jun# , JUL=#jul# , AUG=#aug# , SEP=#sep# , OCT=#oct# , NOV=#nov# , DEC=#dec# , RNGE_ORD=#rngeOrd# , PAY_ITEM_USE_YN=#payItemUseYn# , ITEM_APPTN_BGNN_DT=#itemApptnBgnnDt# , ITEM_APPTN_END_DT=#itemApptnEndDt# , DAY_MNTH_AMNT_DIV_CD=#dayMnthAmntDivCd# , CALC_STD_DIV_CD=#calcStdDivCd# , EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd# , USALY_AMNT_YN=#usalyAmntYn# , ALLW_BNUS_AMNT_YN=#allwBnusAmntYn# , PAY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT=#payItemNoteCtnt# , ACC_PRCS_DIV_CD=#accPrcsDivCd# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD=#busnDtlTypOccuCd# AND BUSN_DTIL_OCCU_CLS_UCST_YR=#busnDtilOccuClsUcstYr# AND PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM BASS2400 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD=#busnDtlTypOccuCd# AND BUSN_DTIL_OCCU_CLS_UCST_YR=#busnDtilOccuClsUcstYr# AND PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD , BUSN_DTIL_OCCU_CLS_UCST_YR , PAY_ITEM_CD , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , PAY_CD , ITEM_NM , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , PYMT_DDUC_FRM_CD , PYMT_DDUC_RATE , PYMT_DDUC_SUM , TXTN_DIV_CD , FREE_DTY_RATE , FREE_DTY_SUM , JAN , FEB , MAR , APR , MAY , JUN , JUL , AUG , SEP , OCT , NOV , DEC , RNGE_ORD , PAY_ITEM_USE_YN , ITEM_APPTN_BGNN_DT , ITEM_APPTN_END_DT , DAY_MNTH_AMNT_DIV_CD , CALC_STD_DIV_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , USALY_AMNT_YN , ALLW_BNUS_AMNT_YN , PAY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT , ACC_PRCS_DIV_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM BASS2400 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD=#busnDtlTypOccuCd# AND BUSN_DTIL_OCCU_CLS_UCST_YR=#busnDtilOccuClsUcstYr# AND PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD , BUSN_DTIL_OCCU_CLS_UCST_YR , PAY_ITEM_CD , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , PAY_CD , ITEM_NM , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , PYMT_DDUC_FRM_CD , PYMT_DDUC_RATE , PYMT_DDUC_SUM , TXTN_DIV_CD , FREE_DTY_RATE , FREE_DTY_SUM , JAN , FEB , MAR , APR , MAY , JUN , JUL , AUG , SEP , OCT , NOV , DEC , RNGE_ORD , PAY_ITEM_USE_YN , ITEM_APPTN_BGNN_DT , ITEM_APPTN_END_DT , DAY_MNTH_AMNT_DIV_CD , CALC_STD_DIV_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , USALY_AMNT_YN , ALLW_BNUS_AMNT_YN , PAY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT , ACC_PRCS_DIV_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM BASS2400 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD DESC , BUSN_DTIL_OCCU_CLS_UCST_YR DESC , PAY_ITEM_CD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BASS2400 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
